text:
The Haryana government on Saturday set up committees to settle compensation claims of Rs one crore and above for loss to property in Jhajjar, Hisar and Sonipat districts during last month’s Jat agitation for quota.

The committees will be headed by Additional Deputy Commissioner in the districts concerned, Urban Local Bodies Minister Kavita Jain said.

The Minister said each committee would include an HCS officer and president of market association besides officials of some other departments. - PTI
title: Panels set up to settle compensation claims
